text: Russell Dana "Russ" Feingold (born March 2, 1953) is an American politician and lawyer from the state of Wisconsin. He was a member of the Democratic Party of the United States Senate from 1993 to 2011 and a Wisconsin State Senator from 1983 to 1993. On May 14, 2015 he announced his candidacy for a 2016 U.S. Senate run against the incumbent Senator, Ron Johnson. He was defeated by Johnson in a rematch of their 2010 Senate race. ==References== Category:1953 births Category:Living people Category:Alumni of the University of Oxford Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians Category:Lawyers from Wisconsin Category:Harvard University alumni Category:Jewish American politicians Category:Jewish lawyers Category:State legislators of the United States Category:United States senators from Wisconsin Category:University of Wisconsinâ€“Madison alumni Category:People from Janesville, Wisconsin Category:20th-century American politicians Category:21st-century American politicians
title: Russ Feingold
